--The room is shrouded in darkness.%K%P
Covering and concealing everything, here in this\nplace where no light can reach.%K%P
\dHah... Haaah... Ugh...\d%K%P
I bite my nails, clench my teeth, and sob for what\nseems like an eternity as I wait for morning.%K%P
A miserable pile of crumpled clothes and shredded\ntissues surrounds me.%K%P
\dJust...a little more...\d%K%P
Night will eventually come to an end.%K%P
But in the meantime, this deep darkness feels like\nit will last forever.--%K%P
\dYukari lives again!\d%K%P
The night had finally faded into morning.%K%P
\dGood morning, Akira!\d%K%P
\dIsn't this just the best morning ever?\d%K%P
This had to be the brightest I'd ever seen Yukari\nsmile.%K%P
\dMorning. You're, uh...real chipper today.\d%K%P
\dI'm always chipper in front of my beloved\nhusband!\d%K%P
\dThat's not what I meant...\d%K%P
It was true that Yukari tended to be full of\nenergy, but this was on another level altogether.%K%P
It was different enough to make me worry.%K%P
\dWhat were you doing these two days, anyway?\d%K%P
I hadn't seen her at all after Shion took over. Not\nuntil now.%K%P
\dI'm too embarrassed to tell you...\d%K%P
\dBut it's not right for a wife to hide things from\nher husband! It's my duty to be always truthful to\nyou.\d%K%P
\dSo I'll tell you, secretly, what I've been up to\nall this time.\d%K%P
She moved closer to my ear.%K%P
*blow!*%K%P
\dYikes! Wh-What was that for?!\d%K%P
I'd thought Yukari was going to whisper in my ear,\nbut instead she just blew into it.%K%P
\dI'm so sorry, I couldn't help myself!\d%K%P
\dCan you please be a little more serious?\d%K%P
\dOf course! So...\d%K%P
\dNom!\d%K%P
\dGah!\d%K%P
This time, she lightly bit my ear.%K%P
\dYukari!\d%K%P
\dHehehe! It's your fault for having such lovely\nears, Akira! It's a crime to be so cute!\d%K%P
\d...I won't be angry if you hurry up and tell me\nwhat's going on.\d%K%P
Being played again and again was starting to annoy\nme.%K%P
\dFine, fine! We haven't seen each other for such a\nlong time, I just wanted to show some affection...\d%K%P
\dAnyway, here's the truth you wanted to hear.\d%K%P
\dI've been hiding out in my room the whole time.\d%K%P
\dAhaha... Awkward!\d%K%P
She looked more thrilled than awkward. Still, at\nleast I knew what had happened now.%K%P
\dWhy would you do that?\d%K%P
\dBecause if I left the room, I'd definitely see you\nbe intimate with someone else.\d%K%P
\dAnd that would make me so...so...!\d%K%P
\dOkay, okay, I get it now. That's why you made\nyourself scarce, huh?\d%K%P
\dYup. You have no idea how lonely I felt, not being\nable to see you for two whole days!\d%K%P
\dI suppressed all my urges! How about some praise?\nCommend me for being such a good girl!\d%K%P
\dYou sure did great. Good girl!\d%K%P
\dHehehe!\d%K%P
As I patted Yukari on the head, her expression\nmelted and she scooted closer to me.%K%P
Kaede had told me what was going on, so I hadn't\nbeen overly worried or anything.%K%P
But this rotation thing seemed to be putting a lot\nmore stress on Yukari than I had expected.%K%P
\dNow it's finally my turn again. I feel completely\nrevived!\d%K%P
\dI was about to die from lack of Akira. I need to\nrecharge! Recharge!\d%K%P
\dRecharge how, exactly?\d%K%P
\dWith a kiss or something?\d%K%P
\d...Yes, please.\d%K%P
She nodded meekly, her cheeks flushed.%K%P
To look at her now, Yukari was the very picture of\nan adorable maiden in love.%K%P
\dSure, let's kiss...\d%K%P
\dWait!\d%K%P
\dWhat? Why?\d%K%P
Just when the mood was starting to get good, too.%K%P
\dBrush your teeth and take a bath first.\d%K%P
\dI'll prepare breakfast in the meantime!\d%K%P
Yukari all but shoved me into the bathroom.%K%P
*hum, hum*%K%P
I peeked into the kitchen after bathing and saw\nYukari cooking happily.%K%P
\dAkira! You're back. I'm almost done here, just\nwait one moment!\d%K%P
She flashed a brilliant smile at me and returned to\nher cooking.%K%P
\dYukari's finally out?\d%K%P
\dShe never left her room at all?\d%K%P
\dApparently. She even had her food brought to her\nthere.\d%K%P
That was kinda impressive, in a way.%K%P
\dEven if it was to avoid a jealousy attack, it was\nkind of an extreme length to go to. Don't you think\nso, Kaede?\d%K%P
\dWell...\d%K%P
\dI have to say, I understand how she feels.\d%K%P
\dSome things are just beyond your control, even if\nyou think you've got your heart reined in...\d%K%P
\d...You mean the Tatari?\d%K%P
The rule was that the girls wouldn't interfere\nduring each other's turns, but it wasn't like\nYukari could control what happened with her.%K%P
The more she suppressed her feelings, the gloomier\nshe'd get, which would boost her Tatarigami powers.%K%P
\dI doubt she'd feel like she had any right to Aki\nif she broke the rules.\d%K%P
\dIs a Tatari attack that hard to fight off?\d%K%P
\dI wouldn't call it a mere 'attack.' Tatari is\nsomething much more formidable.\d%K%P
\dAnd it's not something you can endure by sheer\nwillpower. No amount of effort will stop it.\d%K%P
\dI had no idea...\d%K%P
Although I could suppress Yukari's Tatari, I didn't\ncompletely understand it myself.%K%P
I couldn't imagine how Yukari felt, being a\nTatarigami.%K%P
Giving her any half-baked advice would probably\nbackfire spectacularly.%K%P
After eating, I started my work at the shrine.%K%P
With Yukari by my side, of course.%K%P
\dIt's such a nice, clear, autumn day. Almost like\nnature is giving us its blessing!\d%K%P
\dYou're so dramatic, Yukari.\d%K%P
\dHeheh, I'll take that as a compliment.\d%K%P
\dI just know I'll always be happy as long as I'm\nwith you, Akira.\d%K%P
\dAlways, huh?\d%K%P
\dYou first came to Kamimori to stop being a\nTatarigami. Have you given up on that?\d%K%P
\d...Oh, yeah...\d%K%P
\dWhat's with that reaction? Don't tell me you\nforgot about it?\d%K%P
\dI-I didn't! Of course not!\d%K%P
\dI'm not some fool who would forget something so\nimportant just because I was infatuated with our\nnewlywed life!\d%K%P
...She had totally forgotten.%K%P
But I guess it proved she was happy enough here to\nbe able to put the whole Tatarigami business out of\nher mind.%K%P
\dI still want to get better.\d%K%P
\dIt's the Tatari's fault I had to hide from the\nworld for two days, after all.\d%K%P
\dBesides, if people knew your wife was a Tatarigami\nit could cause a scandal.\d%K%P
\dI'd be really sad to hear people say I'm not fit\nto be your partner...\d%K%P
\dYukari...\d%K%P
Her wistful smile made me sad as well.%K%P
A husband should never look that sad around his\nwife.%K%P
\dI don't care about that.\d%K%P
\dIt doesn't matter if you're a Tatarigami. To me,\nYukari is Yukari.\d%K%P
\dAkira... You...\d%K%P
\dNothing anyone in town says will faze me. My\nmind's already made up.\d%K%P
I wouldn't have said all those things on the night\nof the festival otherwise.%K%P
*sniff* \dI'm so happy I could die...\d%K%P
\dAre you trying to smother me with joy and\nhappiness?\d%K%P
\dI love you so much...so much!\d%K%P
\dI mean, I've always loved you, but you've just\nmade me fall for you all over again! I'm\noverflowing with love!\d%K%P
Yukari's expression transformed. I could see stars\nin her eyes.%K%P
\dCan I hug you? Kiss you? I won't take no for an\nanswer!\d%K%P
\dMy darling Akiraaa!\d%K%P
She pounced on me in her exhilaration.%K%P
\dI looove you!\d *smooch* \dLove you love you!\d\n*smooch, smooch*%K%P
I was being showered in kisses.%K%P
She held on to me so tightly, I thought my back\nmight break.%K%P
\dAkira! Akira!\d%K%P
\dS-Slow down a little! You're hurting me!\d%K%P
\dOh!\d%K%P
She finally realized what she was doing and\nloosened her grip.%K%P
\dSorry... I couldn't help myself.\d%K%P
\dIt's fine, don't apologize.\d%K%P
\dBut I'm too excitable and always end up making\nmore trouble for you...\d%K%P
\dThat's why I've decided!\d%K%P
\dI'm going to work hard to become a normal\nGoddess and stop being a Tatarigami!\d%K%P
